Articles.Content: I don't know if someone already suggested this but it wasn't in the "Already Suggested List". So last time i was flying around Kerbin with my Spaceplane and in Map View i noticed, that planes are displayed with the capsule icon. I play KSP since 1 Year now and as far as i know Planes have been a feature before docking port and therefore space stations. So why is there no icon for it? I guess it's something really small to change but it would be really nice since there are a lot of people (including me) that use spaceplanes a lot.

More icons in the rename dialogue would be great, I personally want "Satellite" as a separate type to "Probe", and perhaps also a distinction between probe orbiters and probe landers. I've also heard of people wanting other icons, such as "Mothership" for those big interplanetary vessels, and manned rovers.

I do support aircraft icons, though perhaps different icons for aeroplanes and spaceplanes?

I agree, we need icons for planes and space planes, maybe have it based on if it has a rocket engine or not. We also need icons for recoverable stages for when money starts to matter and they add support for Falcon 9-ish rockets landing on their own, as well as icons for motherships/mobile space stations/whatever you call big interplanetary ships.

Somewhat related idea i just had: Why not make the icons colored so you can filter based on that too? And have one color saved for ships that were part of your ship at launch.
